incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 20/01/2025 02:00 UTC End time : 20/01/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment to improve general performance. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 20/01/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 24/01/2025 18:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our OVHcloud Connect offer. This may affect functionality. Start time : 20/01/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 21/01/2025 01:00 UTC Service impact : During scheduled maintenance, dual-attachment customers may experience brief network disruption, while single-attachment customers will have temporary service interruption. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our OVHcloud Connect offer, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 20/01/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 21/01/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. This will temporarily affect availability. Start time : 21/01/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 21/01/2025 19:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in this rack will be unreachable for maximum 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade SBG3/S333A04 The maintenance can be shorter than announced and we will do our best to reduce the outage time. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 15/01/2025 13:00 UTC End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a downtime of up to 20 minutes for each intervention. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. We have carefully planned and scheduled the interventions to minimize any potential impact on your services. The maintenance schedule is as follows: BHS4 : Start of intervention at 13:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T04A, T04B and T04C )
BHS5 : Start of intervention at 13:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H)
BHS6 : Start of intervention at 15:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G)
BHS7(first part) : Start of intervention at 15:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B702, B703, B707 and B709)
BHS7(second part) : Start of intervention at 16:30 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B710 and B716)
Thank you for your understanding.
